item.title: Hello, #30DaysOfPlaywright
item.description: Let’s Learn About Testing! It’s December 1! The new year is just over 30 days away so it’s the perfect time to make a learning resolution, get started on it now - and then check it off the very first day of the New Year! So what do you want to learn this year? I’ve decided to invest this month exploring a topic that fascinates me - end-to-end testing for modern web apps.
